Package com.tecchtitans.eng1

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tecchtitans.eng1.Map
  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is used for storing information about a map that can be displayed by a screen. Includes a TiledMap, a world border, a camera border, building objects placed on the map, an orthographic camera and a tiled map renderer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Map​(java.lang.String path, int width, int height)
      Instantiates a Map with a desired Tiled map internal path input as a string.

      Returns the orthographic camera being used by the map.

      int getWidth()
      Returns the map's width.
      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle getWorldBorder()
      Returns the world border.
      void render()
      Renders the current map by calling the camera's update method, setting the map renderer's view camera to this updated camera, and then calling the map renderer's update method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map​(java.lang.String path,
           int width,
           int height)
        Instantiates a Map with a desired Tiled map internal path input as a string. Initialises a camera with the desired width and height. Initialises a map renderer for the desired map. Initialises an array to stored building objects from the map in. The collision layer, camera layer, and building layers from the map are processed to set the world border, camera border, and building objects respectively.
        Parameters:
        path - - String of an internal file path to a map in a .tmx format.
        width - - maybe not needed.
        height - - maybe not needed.
